cs213.photoAlbum.guiview

Class OpenAlbum

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.awt.Component
      • java.awt.Container
        • java.awt.Window
          • java.awt.Frame
            • javax.swing.JFrame
              • cs213.photoAlbum.guiview.OpenAlbum
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, javax.accessibility.Accessible, javax.swing.RootPaneContainer, javax.swing.WindowConstants

    public class OpenAlbum
extends javax.swing.JFrame
    OpenAlbum Class This frame displays the thumbnails of the current album. It is used to show the details of each photo. The user can add a new photo, delete a photo, move selected photo to a different album, and start a slide show of the current album. The user can click on each thumbnail and perform operations on the selected photo.
    Author:
    Nadiia Chepurko
    See Also:
    JFrame, InteractiveMode, DisplayPhoto, AddPhoto, MovePhoto, Serialized Form

    • Constructor Detail

      • OpenAlbum

        public OpenAlbum(InteractiveMode owner,
                 GuiView logic)
        Constructor for the Open Album class.
        Parameters:
        owner - an instance of interactive mode that is the owner of this frame.
        logic - an instance of GuiView that perform the logic operations.

    • Method Detail

      • open

        public void open(java.lang.String current,
                 java.lang.String fileName)
        This method initializes this frame for displaying an album. It loads the pictures for the album to be displayed and puts them in the display area. Also shows the details of pictures.
        Parameters:
        current - the album to be displayed.
        fileName - a picture to select after the pictures are displayed.

      • close

        public void close()
        Clears this window to prepare it to display a different album.

      • addPhoto

        public boolean addPhoto(java.lang.String fileName,
                        java.lang.String caption)
                 throws java.io.FileNotFoundException,
                        AlbumNotFoundException
        Adds a new photo to the current album. A new thumbnail is added to the display area for the new photo object added to the album.
        Parameters:
        fileName - file to be added.
        caption - caption of the new photo.
        Returns:
        true if the photo was added to the album, false otherwise.
        Throws:
        java.io.FileNotFoundException
        AlbumNotFoundException

      • addIcon

        public void addIcon(java.lang.String fileName)
        Adds a new thumbnail to the display area of this album.
        Parameters:
        fileName - the name of file for which the thumbnail has to be added.

      • selectNewPhoto

        public void selectNewPhoto(PicturePanel next,
                           boolean moveScroll)
        This method selects a new photo in the display area. The border of the selected thumbnail turns black. When a thumbnail is selected the user can perform operations on the photo.
        Parameters:
        next - the PicturePanel to be selected.

      • openCurrentPhoto

        public void openCurrentPhoto()
        This method opens the slide show window starting with the currently selected photo.

      • getCurrentAlbum

        public java.lang.String getCurrentAlbum()
        Gets the currently opened album.
        Returns:
        the currently opened album.

      • deleteSelectedPhoto

        public void deleteSelectedPhoto()
        Deleted the currently selected photo from thumbnails of this album. The new selected photo becomes the first thumbnail.

      • movePhoto

        public boolean movePhoto(java.lang.String targetAlbum)
                  throws java.io.FileNotFoundException,
                         AlbumNotFoundException,
                         PhotoNotFoundException,
                         java.lang.IllegalArgumentException
        This method moves the currently selected photo to another album. The new selected photo becomes the first thumbnail in the list.
        Parameters:
        targetAlbum - album to move the photo to.
        Returns:
        true if the photo was moved, false otherwise.
        Throws:
        java.io.FileNotFoundException - gets thrown when the file of the photo cannot be found on disc.
        AlbumNotFoundException - gets thrown when the target album cannot be found.
        PhotoNotFoundException - gets thrown if the photo to move cannot be found.
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - gets thrown on illegal arguments.

      • recaptionCurrentPhoto

        public boolean recaptionCurrentPhoto(java.lang.String newCaption)
        This method changes the caption of the currently selected PicturePanel thumbnail.
        Parameters:
        newCaption - the new caption to be set.
        Returns:
        true if the caption was reset, false otherwise.
